_inspectorSnowReport.Report:
Friday January 30th 2026 | 5:31

Bonjour Tremblant!

It’s another chilly morning on the mountain—but also another incredible ski day! Bundle up for the cold start, with temperatures warming as the day goes on. We picked up 2 cm of fresh snow overnight, and our mountain teams have everything open: all 102 trails, top to bottom. Fresh snow, full access, and plenty of turns waiting out there today. 

 Please note that the Duncan and Soleil chairlifts will open at 10:00 AM this morning, along with all skiable terrain on the Soleil side.

First Tracks: Enjoy early access starting at 7:45 a.m. on select lifts on both the North and South sides of the mountain.

Glade Skiing: With fresh snow falling daily, glade skiing is outstanding right now. We have 17 gladed runs open, offering playful turns, great coverage, and some of the best conditions of the season.

Terrain Parks: Park riders have plenty to choose from today, with all 4 terrain parks open, featuring a variety of features for different ability levels.

For those heading off the groomers, Alpine Touring and Snowshoeing conditions are excellent, with all 15 sectors open and looking beautiful today.

Another great day to be on the mountain—stay warm and make the most of every turn! 

Mountain safety tip of the week:  Always stay in control to ensure you can stop and avoid others or obstacles.
 
Snow fall is recorded daily at 5 a.m from mid-mountain at North Side (550 m / 1,800 ft). This data, based on 24 hours, provides a picture of on-mountain conditions. Actual accumulation may differ from the official report. Be aware of changing conditions. Lifts and trails exist in a mountain environment and may close due to weather, usage and/or special maintenance.
_inspectorSnowReport.Alert:
SATURDAY 31st OF JANUARY 2026

Here is some information about the operations on Saturday, January 31, 2026.
-Duncan lift, Soleil lift, and Soleil slope opening gradually
-On the North side, the first tracks by Expo and Lowell Thomas.
-Casino Express in operation at 7:30
_inspectorSnowReport.SafetyReport: Happy Friday! We picked up 2cm of fresh snow overnight. It’s a cold start this morning, so bundle up. Note:Duncan and Soleil chairlifts will open at 10:00 AM this morning, along with all skiable terrain on the Soleil side. Enjoy 102 runs open, 4 snow parks, & 17 gladed trails. Have an amazing day on the mountain, stay warm,  and ski safe! Mountain safety tip of the week: Always stay in control to ensure you can stop and avoid others or obstacles.
_inspectorSnowReport.SafetyReportFrench: Bon vendredi! Nous avons reçu 2 cm de neige. Il fait froid ce matin, habillez-vous chaudement. Noter: les remontées Duncan et Soleil ouvriront à 10h , tout comme le terrain skiable du secteur Soleil. Passez une superbe journée, restez bien au chaud et profitez de chaque virage! Conseil de sécurité en montagne de la semaine: Gardez le contrôle en tout temps afin de pouvoir vous arrêter et éviter les personnes ou obstacles.
